narrative.title: Pistoia Division - 1943Q2
narrative.situation: Italian Motorized Infantry Division (Degraded) deployed in North Africa during 1943Q2.
narrative.objectives: Defensive infantry division in final Tunisia Campaign battles. Mission: hold Enfidaville Line against British Eighth Army. No offensive capability. Division combat-ineffective by late April 1943. Surrendered May 13, 1943.
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Northern Tunisia - mountainous terrain, wadis, coastal plains. Enfidaville Line defensive positions. Shrinking Axis perimeter.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Two engineer battalions for defensive fortifications only

environment.terrain_type: Northern Tunisia - mountainous terrain, wadis, coastal plains. Enfidaville Line defensive positions. Shrinking Axis perimeter.
